sentence.Network_en: "Anyhow," she added briskly, "it's none of my business."
sentence.Network_cn: “不管怎样”，她轻松地补充说，“这不关我的事。”

sentence.Network_en: Mother certainly won't let him stay with her and anyhow he wouldn't.
sentence.Network_cn: 母亲当然不会让他和她住在一起，再说他也不愿意。

sentence.Network_en: Where the hell was Bud, anyhow?

PerfectNetExp.abs: (A-B)英语四级词汇表下载 ... anybody prep. 任何人 anyhow ad. 无论如何 anyone pron. 任何人.
2013年高考英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... anybody pron. 任何人，无论谁 anyhow ad. 不管怎样 anyone pron. 任何人，无论谁.
反字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 反照〖 reflection〗 反正〖 anyhow〗 反正〖 returntotherightway〗.
专升2012年专升本英语词汇表词汇表_百度文库 ... anybody 任何人，无论谁 anyhow 无论如何；总之 anyone 无论谁，任何人.

list.abs: It may snow , but anyhow I will go to town ., 可能要下雪 , 但我无论如何要进城.
it may rain , but anyhow i shall go out ., 天可能要下雨 , 但无论如何我要出门.
You handle things anyhow ., 你作事漫不经心.
This cashier will not satisfy me ; she works anyhow ., 这个收款员不会令我满意 , 她工作太马虎了.

entry.def: Anyhow means the same as anyway .

entry.tran: 马马虎虎地；杂乱无章地
entry.def: If you do something anyhow, you do it in a careless or untidy way.

example.ex: ...her long legs which she displayed all anyhow getting in and out of her car.
example.tran: 她上下车时不经意露出的长腿

means.word_mean: 1. used to indicate that a statement explains or supports a previous statement;

sentences.sentence: "I think they're asleep; anyhow, they're quiet"
"I don't know what happened to it; anyway, it's gone"
"anyway, there is another factor to consider"
"I don't know how it started; in any case, there was a brief scuffle"
"in any event, the government faced a serious protest"
"but at any rate he got a knighthood for it"

means.word_mean: 不管怎样说, 无论如何, 至少

sentences.en: He told me not to buy it, but I bought it anyhow.
sentences.cn: 他告诉我不要买它, 但不管怎样, 我还是买了。

means.word_mean: 不论用何种方法, 无论从什么角度

sentences.cn: ”“好吧, 不管好歹, 反正我按铃了。”

means.word_mean: 随随便便地, 杂乱无章地

sentences.en: Her clothes were thrown down just anyhow.

jushi.english: Her clothes were thrown down just anyhow.
I can see as well as you,anyhow.
jushi.chinese: 不管怎么说，我看得和你一样清楚。
“好吧,不管好歹,反正我按铃了。”
